content: materials to make two hats in any size switching main color and contrast color for the second one you ll need purl soho s fine print 1 75% superwash wool and 25% nylon each ball of this fingering-weight yarn is approximately 218 yards/ 50 grams - main color 1 ball approximately 100 130 total yards required - contrast color for pom pom 1 ball approximately 50 total yards required you ll also need - a set of us 1½ 2 75 mm double pointed needles 2 - stitch markers 3 including one unique - a pom pom maker we used purl soho s pom pom maker set 4 in small + large gauge 34 stitches and 41 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes newborn baby - finished circumference approximately 12¾ 15 inches - finished height 6 7 inches designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 5 see more of gianna s designs on her instagram 6 all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/fine-print html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/pom-pom-maker-set html 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
